languages.title: Language

onboarding.welcome:
Welcome to your new watering manager.
I am Mizu and I will help you to take care of your plants!
onboarding.introduction:
For starters
how can I call you?
onboarding.greetings:
Greetings, {{username}}!
Do you want to set an avatar?
onboarding.done:
We are all set.
Let’s add some plant to your garden!

plant_form.title: Plant infos
plant_form.field_has_moisture_sensor: Have you got a moisture sensor?
plant_form.field_watering_frequency: Do you want to set a watering frequency?
plant_form.form_notice: Theses data will be added to our database in order to fill it and let you have a better experience with our app. If you want to participate, let us know by contacting us!
plant_form.sensor_notice:
Enter the soil moisture sensor ID.
You can get it after it initialization.

plant_infos_form.title: Plant infos
plant_infos_form.helper_text:
Fill the plants informations.
You don’t need to fill everything, we will complete and review your submission :)

plant_infos_form.field_soil_helper: What kind of soil does it need?
